Jeff

Class ScholarPubController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Jeff.ScholarPubController

  • public class ScholarPubController
extends java.lang.Object
    Project #3 CS 2334, Section 011 10/9/2013 This class allows for user interaction between a selection view, a display view, and a scholarship model
    Version:
    1.0
